title: BugSplatRC resoure DLL not found
body:
So I've been having this problem for awhile now, I've reinstalled the game multiple times and tried to find fixes and none of them work, any information will be helpful.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there Lyf,

Have you attempted a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7)? Give that a go and let me know if the issue persists.
